title: Let's Play A Game
description: "Sometimes monsters don't live under your bed, they live inside your head."Everyone has a wish, a little dream that they have held onto for so long and would do anything to turn into reality. Something that can push them to the edge of insanity.They say that if you perform this ritual, if you play this little game and win then all your dreams can come true. After all, every victor deserves the best and a little game couldn't possibly hurt anyone. Take the easy way out and never worry about a thing in the world again. Play the game with all you have.Just don't ask what happens if you lose.
author: Aparajita Yadav
